nodes.text: Mard Gemen was a male Zygerrian who was the brother of Jorec Gemen. The two served as a Royal archivist during the tenure of Queen Miraj Scintel. When Atai Molec became the new King, Jorec and his brother were ordered to serve Molec's son, Prince Sono Molec, on the planet Kowak. Mard and Jorec were extremely unsatisfied with such change.
